name: @yoonit/style
description: The SASS Atomic Design System that powers Web & Native Yoonit Components

scripts.major: npm version major && npm run tag
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm run tag
scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run tag
scripts.tag:force:
PACKAGE_VERSION=$(sed -n '/"version"/s/[^0-9.]//gp' package.json | tr -d '
') && git tag v$PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags && git push

author.name: Luigui Delyer, Vit√≥ria Costa, Sabrina Sampaio, Gabriel Moraes, Tiago Brito, Fernando Junior, Ronalson Filho, Gabriel Mule & Gabriel Rizzo @ Cyberlabs AI - 2021
